examples: She made her entry to the sound of thunderous applause.
Hizo su entrada con el sonido de un estruendoso aplauso.
The children were surprised by the sudden entry of their teacher.
Los niños se sorprendieron por la entrada repentina de su maestra.
They block the entry of the HIV virus into the cells.
Bloquean la entrada del virus del VIH en las células.
How did the thieves gain entry into the building?
